Vladimir

Vladimir's Story:

Don't challenge him, or he'll get the Kremlin to take you out.

Name: Vladimir

Age: 69 months (nice)

Breed: Russian Nohair

Gender: male

!!!What makes him so special!!!

  • He is territorial and likes to invade any place that he deems to be a threat.
  • As long as you keep him on a leash, he will be loyal to you.
  • Likes long walks in Ukraine, does not like the name Zelensky
